#summary Frontal Eye Field
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaMAA] -> [BrainRegionMCA_NC_PMC_FEF]
----

This page covers biological details of component Frontal Eye Field.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Prefrontal Cortex (NC.PFC) -> Dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex (FCA.NC.DLPFC) -> Frontal Eye Field (MCA.NC.PMC.FEF) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaMAA Neocortical Brain - Motor Aggregation Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 08
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Initiation of eye movements
  * *Notes to function*: Voluntary saccades and pursuit eye movements

*Component items*:
  * *Caudal Frontal Eye Field* (*MCA.NC.PMC.CFEF*): Head and eye movements toward visual stimuli
  * *Anterior Frontal Eye Field* (*MCA.NC.PMC.AFEF*): Head and eye movements toward auditory stimuli
